page.title: 10DOUNBY LEGEND: "QUEER"
page.content: There are two{legends}about "Queer". "Queer" is an old house belonging to the Church of Scotland built on the side of{Greeny Hill}and looking down on the{Loch of Sabiston.}Nowadays it is deserted but long ago two old ladies lived there and it was surrounded by a forest. In one legend they burnt down the forest because some wild animal which lived in the forest had killed one of the ladies' cows. In the second, robbers and thieves are supposed to have hidden in the forest. They tormented the ladies until they burnt down the forest to get rid of them. Afterwards, realising what they had done they moved out. One lady went to live in the Evie Manse while the other moved to the Birsay Manse.
